TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Html32TextWriter extends System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter

summary.span: 向 ASP.NET 服务器控件的输出流写入一系列特定于 HTML 3.2 的字符和文本。

span.span: Writes a series of HTML 3.2-specific characters and text to the output stream for an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 类提供 ASP.NET 服务器控件在将 HTML 3.2 内容呈现给客户端时所使用的格式化功能。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering HTML 3.2 content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类的替代项 。The class is an alternative to the class. 它将 HTML 4.0 样式特性转换为等效的 HTML 3.2 标记和特性。It converts HTML 4.0 style attributes into the equivalent HTML 3.2 tags and attributes. 它使用 HTML 表标准化属性（如颜色和字体）的传播。It standardizes the propagation of attributes, such as colors and fonts, using HTML tables. ASP.NET 通过检查类的属性，自动将此类用于 HTML 3.2 和更早版本的浏览器 。ASP.NET automatically uses this class for HTML 3.2 and earlier browsers by checking the property of the class. 除非您创建面向使用 HTML 3.2 标记的设备的自定义页或控件适配器，否则不需要显式创建该类的实例 。Unless you create a custom page or control adapter that targets devices that use HTML 3.2 markup, you do not need to create an instance of the class explicitly. 有关自定义页面和控件呈现的详细信息，请参阅 [演练：开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For more information about customizing page and control rendering, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `CustomHtml32TextWriter` 派生自类的名为的类 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a class, named `CustomHtml32TextWriter`, that derives from the class. `CustomHtml32TextWriter` 创建两个构造函数，该构造函数遵循类建立的模式 并重写 、 、 和 方法。`CustomHtml32TextWriter` creates two constructors that follow the pattern that is established by the class and overrides the , , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

related.span: 演练：开发和使用自定义服务器控件

span.span: Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Server Control

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类在请求浏览器要求行缩进时使用 字段中指定的行缩进。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the line indentation that is specified in the field when the requesting browser requires line indentation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数将 字段值传递到具有以下两个参数的第二个版本：The constructor passes the field value to a second version that has the following two parameters: - `writer`，它采用类的实例 。`writer`, which takes an instance of the class. - `tabString`，它采用定义行缩进的字符串。`tabString`, which takes a string that defines line indentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用派生自类的自定义类 。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that derives from the class. 它有两个构造函数，这是直接或间接从类派生的所有类的标准 。It has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性为 `true` ，则此 方法会将 `div` 控件呈现的任何元素替换为 `table` 元素。If the property is `true`, the method replaces any `div` elements that are rendered by a control with `table` elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderAfterContent() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderAfterContent () As String

summary.span: 写入在 HTML 元素内容之后出现的所有文本或间距。

span.span: Writes any text or spacing that appears after the content of the HTML element.

returns.span: 要在 HTML 元素内容之后写入的间距或文本；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The spacing or text to write after the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 每个重写的方法首先检查是否 `th` 正在呈现某个元素，然后使用 方法检查请求设备是否可以显示粗体格式。Each overridden method first checks whether a `th` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果设备支持粗体格式，则 方法会写入元素的结束标记 `b` 。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `b` element. 如果设备不支持粗体格式，则方法会 写入元素的结束标记 `font` 。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `font` element. 接下来，代码检查是否 `h4` 正在呈现某个元素，然后使用 属性检查请求设备是否可以显示斜体格式。Next, the code checks whether an `h4` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果设备支持斜体格式，则 方法会写入元素的结束标记 `i` 。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the closing tag of an `i` element. 如果设备不支持斜体格式，则方法会 写入元素的结束标记 `font` 。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the closing tag of a `font` element. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string RenderAfterTag() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function RenderAfterTag () As String

summary.span: 写出任何在 HTML 元素的结束标记之后出现的间距或文本。

span.span: Writes any spacing or text that occurs after an HTML element's closing tag.

returns.span: 要在 HTML 元素的结束标记之后写入的间距或文本；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The spacing or text to write after the closing tag of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 代码检查是否 `a` 正在呈现某个元素。The code checks whether an `a` element is being rendered. 如果是这样，则 方法将写入元素的结束标记 `small` 。If so, the method writes the closing tag of a `small` element. 此方法的示例为 元素执行相同的检查 `a` ，然后写入元素的开始标记 `small` 。The example for the method performs the same check for the `a` element, and then writes the opening tag of the `small` element. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#5)]

Protected Overrides Function RenderBeforeContent () As String

summary.span: 写入在 HTML 元素中包含的内容之前出现的所有制表符间距或字体信息。

span.span: Writes any tab spacing or font information that appears before the content that is contained in an HTML element.

returns.span: 要在呈现 HTML 元素的内容之前写入的字体信息和间距；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The font information or spacing to write before rendering the content of the HTML element; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 此代码检查是否 `th` 正在呈现某个元素，然后使用 方法检查请求设备是否可以显示粗体格式。The code checks whether a `th` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果设备支持粗体格式，则 方法会写入元素的开始标记 `b` 。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `b` element. 如果设备不支持粗体格式，则方法会 写入一个元素的开始标记，该 `font` 元素的 `color` 属性设置为十六进制值 "red"。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for red. 接下来，每个方法检查 `h4` 元素是否正在呈现，然后使用 属性检查请求设备是否可以显示斜体格式。Next, each method checks whether an `h4` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果设备支持斜体格式，则 方法会写入元素的开始标记 `i` 。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of an `i` element. 如果设备不支持斜体格式，则方法会 写入一个元素的开始标记，该 `font` 元素的 `color` 属性设置为深蓝色 blue 的十六进制值。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for navy blue. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#2)]

span.span: Writes any text or tab spacing that occurs before the opening tag of an HTML element to the HTML 3.2 output stream.

returns.span: 要在标记之前呈现的 HTML 字体和间距信息；如果没有此类信息要呈现，则为 。

span.span: The HTML font and spacing information to render before the tag; otherwise, if there is no such information to render, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 代码检查是否 `a` 正在呈现某个元素。The code checks whether an `a` element is being rendered. 如果是这样，则重写的 方法将写入元素的开始标记 `small` 。If so, the overridden method writes the opening tag of a `small` element. 的示例对 元素执行相同的检查 `a` ，然后写入元素的结束标记 `small` 。The sample for the performs the same check for the `a` element, and then writes the closing tag of the `small` element. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#3)]

summary.span: 将指定元素的开始标记写入 HTML 3.2 输出流。

span.span: Writes the opening tag of the specified element to the HTML 3.2 output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定了某个 `div` 元素并且 属性值为 `true` ，则该 方法将执行基本 `table` 元素格式设置，以显示元素中包含的内容 `div` 。If a `div` element is specified and the property value is `true`, the method performs basic `table` element formatting to present the content that is contained in the `div` element.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the and methods. 每个重写检查 `Label` 元素是否正在呈现，然后使用 方法检查请求设备是否可以显示粗体格式。Each override checks whether a `Label` element is being rendered, and then uses the method to check whether the requesting device can display bold formatting. 如果设备支持粗体格式，则 方法会写入元素的开始标记， `b` 方法会 写入其结束标记。If the device supports bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `b` element and the method writes its closing tag. 如果设备不支持粗体格式，则方法会 写入一个元素的开始标记，该 `Font` 元素的 `color` 属性设置为十六进制值 red，而 方法则写入结束标记。If the device does not support bold formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `Font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for red, and the method writes the closing tag. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: if the requesting device supports italic text; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the and methods. 每个替代检查是否 `span` 正在呈现某个元素，然后使用 属性检查请求设备是否可以显示斜体格式。Each override checks whether a `span` element is being rendered, and then uses the property to check whether the requesting device can display italic formatting. 如果设备支持斜体格式，则 方法会写入元素的开始标记， `i` 方法会 写入其结束标记。If the device supports italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of an `i` element and the method writes its closing tag. 如果设备不支持斜体格式，则方法会 写入一个元素的开始标记，该 `Font` 元素的 `color` 属性设置为深蓝色 blue 的十六进制值，并且该 方法将写入结束标记。If the device does not support italic formatting, the method writes the opening tag of a `Font` element with a `color` attribute set to the hexadecimal value for navy blue, and the method writes the closing tag. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/cs/html32textwritersamps.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter_Samples1/VB/html32textwritersamps.vb#2)]
